casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Douglas Harold MCMICKLE 532P11-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 *242Francis W. Crawley, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Douglas H. McMickle, for McMickle, Douglas Harold.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of August 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
